DellSoftwareInventory.description: The DellSoftwareInventory resource is a representation of an available device firmware in the managed system.
DellSoftwareInventory.longDescription: The DellSoftwareInventory resource is a representation of an available device firmware in the managed system.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BuildNumber.description: This property represents the build number of the software.
BuildNumber.longDescription: This property represents the build number of the software.

Classifications.description: An array of enumerated integers that classify this software.
Classifications.longDescription: An array of enumerated integers that classify this software.

ComponentID.description: The property value, together with the ComponentType property value, uniquely identifies the system component the software is for.
ComponentID.longDescription: The property value, together with the ComponentType property value, uniquely identifies the system component the software is for.

ComponentType.description: This property has one of the following values: FRMW, BIOS, APAC.
ComponentType.longDescription: This property has one of the following values: FRMW, BIOS, APAC.

DeviceID.description: This property represents an address or other identifying information to uniquely name the LogicalDevice.
DeviceID.longDescription: This property represents an address or other identifying information to uniquely name the LogicalDevice.

ElementName.description: ElementName is the user-friendly name for the instance.
ElementName.longDescription: ElementName is the user-friendly name for the instance.

HashValue.description: The property represents the SHA256 hash value of the component firmware.
HashValue.longDescription: The property represents the SHA256 hash value of the component firmware.

IdentityInfoType.description: This property has the value OrgID:ComponentType:ComponentID for non-PCI device software and OrgID:ComponentType:DeviceID:SubDeviceID:VendorID:SubVendorID for PCI device software.
IdentityInfoType.longDescription: This property has the value OrgID:ComponentType:ComponentID for non-PCI device software and OrgID:ComponentType:DeviceID:SubDeviceID:VendorID:SubVendorID for PCI device software.

IdentityInfoValue.description: This property represents an indexed array of fixed-form strings that provide the software descriptor in the form identified in the corresponding index of the IdentityInfoValue array.
IdentityInfoValue.longDescription: This property represents an indexed array of fixed-form strings that provide the software descriptor in the form identified in the corresponding index of the IdentityInfoValue array.

InstallationDate.description: This property represents the installation date, in string format. Note: For CPLD firmware on modular servers, the property is always set to Jan 1, 2000 regardless of the actual update date.
InstallationDate.longDescription: This property represents the installation date, in string format. Note: For CPLD firmware on modular servers, the property is always set to Jan 1, 2000 regardless of the actual update date.

IsEntity.description: The IsEntity property is used for indicating whether the SoftwareIdentity corresponds to a discrete copy of the software component or is being used to convey descriptive and identifying information about software that is not present in the management domain.
IsEntity.longDescription: The IsEntity property is used for indicating whether the SoftwareIdentity corresponds to a discrete copy of the software component or is being used to convey descriptive and identifying information about software that is not present in the management domain.

MajorVersion.description: This property represents the Major number component of the software version.
MajorVersion.longDescription: This property represents the Major number component of the software version.

MinorVersion.description: This property represents the Minor number component of the software version.
MinorVersion.longDescription: This property represents the Minor number component of the software version.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

RevisionNumber.description: This property represents the revision number component of the software version.
RevisionNumber.longDescription: This property represents the revision number component of the software version.

RevisionString.description: This property represents the revision number, in string format.
RevisionString.longDescription: This property represents the revision number, in string format.

Status.description: This property indicates whether the software is installed or is available for installation.
Status.longDescription: This property indicates whether the software is installed or is available for installation.

SubDeviceID.description: This property is populated for the PCI Device software. This property represents the SubDeviceID from the PCI device.
SubDeviceID.longDescription: This property is populated for the PCI Device software. This property represents the SubDeviceID from the PCI device.

SubVendorID.description: This property is populated for the PCI Device software. The property represents the SubVendorID from the PCI device.
SubVendorID.longDescription: This property is populated for the PCI Device software. The property represents the SubVendorID from the PCI device.

VendorID.description: This property is populated for the PCI Device software. This property represents the VendorID from the PCI device.
VendorID.longDescription: This property is populated for the PCI Device software. This property represents the VendorID from the PCI device.

impactsTPMmeasurements.description: This property represents if the software impacts the Trusted Platform Module (TPM) measurement and causes a lock-up if not performed with the TPM's knowledge.
impactsTPMmeasurements.longDescription: This property represents if the software impacts the Trusted Platform Module (TPM) measurement and causes a lock-up if not performed with the TPM's knowledge.

title: #DellSoftwareInventory.v1_1_0.DellSoftwareInventory
